text:
Any abnormality of the vital signs requires a call for help
o routinely giving oxytocin 20 units in one litre Sodium Chloride 0,9% over the first eight hours
postoperatively
o routinely rubbing the uterus and expelling clots immediately after completing the CD
o regular postoperative observation of general condition, BP, heart rate and pad checks
o intensive observation (in high care) of women who had excessive bleeding at CD or who are at risk for
further haemorrhage
Manage excessive bleeding
